channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: An Epidemic of Media Doublespeak
item.description: And nowhere is the problem more severe than in the coverage of trans athletes.

item.title: Fried Chicken for the Soul
item.description: Breaking down a whole raw chicken is not for the fainthearted, but the results can be mouthwatering.

item.title: Kentucky's Gov. Beshear says Trump's 'big beautiful bill' will 'hit rural America right in the face'
item.description: Kentucky Gov. Andy Beshear said President Trump and the Republican-controlled Congress are waging war on rural America.

item.title: Pressure from Trump for trade deals before Wednesday deadline, but hints of more time for talks
item.description: The Trump administration is stepping up pressure on trading partners to quickly make new deals before a Wednesday deadline, with plans for the United ...

item.title: Rep. Joaquin Castro calls for probe of weather service staffing following deadly floods in Texas
item.description: Rep. Joaquin Castro said Sunday there should be an investigation into whether staffing shortages at the National Weather Service made it harder to res...

item.title: House Speaker Mike Johnson: Voters will ride high on Trump's 'big beautiful bill' during midterms
item.description: House Speaker Mike Johnson said Sunday that Republicans are confident President Trump's "big, beautiful bill" will be an electoral winner in the 2026 ...

item.title: The Legacy of Alasdair MacIntyre
item.description: What to make of the work and influence of the legendary philosopher and academic in the wake of his death at 96.

item.title: It’s Time to End Government Unions’ Post-Janus Coercion
item.description: The Supreme Court has a chance to put some teeth on its ruling that workers can’t be compelled to pay dues.

item.title: When We Forget Our History, We Risk Our Future
item.description: In our highly partisan political moment, civics education is perhaps more important than ever.

item.title: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent throws shade at Elon Musk's plans for new political party
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent downplayed Elon Musk's announcement that he is forming a new political party in response to President Trump signing h...

item.title: Route 66 Diner Owners Share What They Love About The All-American Nostalgic Road Trip
item.description: People don’t visit Route 66 to change America; they come to be changed by it.

item.title: Men Listen To Podcasters Like Andrew Schulz Because Women Have Invaded Their Real-Life Spaces
item.description: The secret formula the podcasters have figured out is that audiences want to be talked to, not talked at.

item.title: This Independence Day, Ditch The DNA Test And Learn More About Your American Ancestors
item.description: In a frustratingly divided nation, we need stories that unite us to a shared American vision of the good life based on our nation’s founding principle...

item.title: Independence Day Sounds So Much Better Than ‘Fourth Of July’
item.description: Honor our country's birthday as 'Independence Day,' rather than the far more common and clunky 'Fourth of July.'

item.title: Trump Wins Again. Big Beautiful Bill Headed To The President’s Desk
item.description: The signature domestic policy victory is another in a long line of brutal political butt-kickings Teflon Trump has delivered to the Democrats.
